title: Understanding Bizarre Delusions
text: Bizarre delusions are a type of delusion that involves beliefs that are clearly implausible and not understandable to same-culture peers. They often involve a loss of control over mind or body.

hintAnswer: fixed false beliefs with content that is not reasonably possible in this world. They are strange, eccentric, and unrealistic
title: Characteristics of Bizarre Delusions
text: What are the characteristics of bizarre delusions?
choices: a fixed false belief that cannot be changed in the mind of those who hold them despite evidence to the contrary
fixed false beliefs with content that is not reasonably possible in this world. They are strange, eccentric, and unrealistic
a fixed false belief containing content that is plausible but inconsistent with evidence
the perception of sensory experiences without natural external stimuli
